text: Women Talking is a 2022 American drama movie written and directed by Sarah Polley. It is based on the 2018 novel of the same name by Miriam Toews. The movie stars Rooney Mara, Claire Foy, Jessie Buckley, Judith Ivey, Ben Whishaw, and Frances McDormand. It was released on January 20, 2023, by United Artists Releasing. It was named one of the top ten movies of 2022 by the National Board of Review and the American Film Institute. At the 95th Academy Awards, it received nominations for Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. ==References== Category:2022 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Women Talking (movie)
